meanings.definition: The act of erasing or rubbing out.
meanings.sent1: She made several erasions on the paper to correct her mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The teacher used an eraser to make erasions on the whiteboard.
meanings.sent3: The erasions on the document made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a book full of erasions, fading with time.
meanings.sent5: The erasions on the canvas revealed a hidden message underneath.
